M

MARGIN - Static variable in class util.OConstants
The margin used in the layout throughout the application
MAX_ALLOWED_ACTIONS - Static variable in class player.Player
The amount of action a player has during one move
MAX_LENGTH - Static variable in class square.obstacle.LightTrail
Maximum length of a LightTrail.
MAX_TRAVEL_DISTANCE - Static variable in class item.launchable.ChargedIdentityDisc
The maximum travel distance of an identity disc.
MAX_TRAVEL_DISTANCE - Static variable in class item.launchable.IdentityDisc
The maximum travel distance of an uncharged identity disc.
MESSAGE_PROPERTY - Static variable in class controller.GameHandler
 
MIN_HSIZE - Static variable in class grid.Grid
The minimum horizontal size is 10 squares.
MIN_SIZE - Static variable in class square.obstacle.Wall
 
MIN_VSIZE - Static variable in class grid.Grid
The minimum vertical size is 10 squares.
move(Direction) - Method in class controller.MoveHandler
Moves in the given direction if it's possible, if it isn't possible, the player doesn't move but does lose an action
move(Square) - Method in class player.Player
Moves the player to another square
MoveEvent - Class in event.action
The Move event handles all the logic for a player to move from one square to the other.
MoveEvent(Game, Direction) - Constructor for class event.action.MoveEvent
Moves the player into a certain direction.
MoveHandler - Class in controller
Controller/Handler which controls the player move use case
MoveHandler(Game, PropertyChangeListener) - Constructor for class controller.MoveHandler
Creates a new MoveHandler with a given game and a given listener
MultiObstacle - Class in square.obstacle
Super class where any obstacle covering multiple squares inherits its general properties from.
MultiObstacle() - Constructor for class square.obstacle.MultiObstacle
